channel.title: 90's Disney Movies
channel.description: An RSS feed about Disney Movies in the 90's

item.title: A Bug's Life
item.description: A movie about a bunch of little ants that try to escape the rule of evil grasshoppers.

item.title: The Lion King
item.description: A brave little lion cub goes through inner battles in order to find his meaning in life.

item.title: Tarzan
item.description: The touching story of a city girl and a wild man finding love in the strangest of places.

item.title: The Parent Trap
item.description: Two young girls get more than they bargin for when each is sent to a summer camp and find out they have a twin. How will it play out for these girls?
